mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xiaoyoufenhui_id as xiaoyoufenhuiId ,a.chengyuan_name as chengyuanName ,a.chengyuan_photo as chengyuanPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.chengyuan_phone as chengyuanPhone ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,xiaoyoufenhui.xiaoyoufenhui_name as xiaoyoufenhuiName ,xiaoyoufenhui.xiaoyoufenhui_types as xiaoyoufenhuiTypes ,xiaoyoufenhui.xiaoyoufenhui_photo as xiaoyoufenhuiPhoto ,xiaoyoufenhui.xiaoyoufenhui_fuzheren as xiaoyoufenhuiFuzheren ,xiaoyoufenhui.xiaoyoufenhui_address as xiaoyoufenhuiAddress ,xiaoyoufenhui.xiaoyoufenhui_content as xiaoyoufenhuiContent
FROM chengyuan a left JOIN xiaoyoufenhui xiaoyoufenhui ON a.xiaoyoufenhui_id = xiaoyoufenhui.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.xiaoyoufenhui_id = #{params.xiaoyoufenhuiId} )
and a.chengyuan_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.chengyuanName},'%')
and a.sex_types like CONCAT('%',#{params.sexTypes},'%')
and a.chengyuan_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.chengyuanPhone},'%')
and a.xiaoyoufenhui_id IS NOT NULL
and xiaoyoufenhui.xiaoyoufenhui_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyoufenhuiName},'%')
and xiaoyoufenhui.xiaoyoufenhui_types = #{params.xiaoyoufenhuiTypes}
and xiaoyoufenhui.xiaoyoufenhui_fuzheren like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyoufenhuiFuzheren},'%')
and xiaoyoufenhui.xiaoyoufenhui_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyoufenhuiAddress},'%')
and xiaoyoufenhui.xiaoyoufenhui_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xiaoyoufenhuiContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
